adjectives.description: collaborative (comparative more collaborative, superlative most collaborative)

entries.meaning: Of, relating to, or done by collaboration.
examples: No need to thank me - it was a collaborative effort.

entries.meaning: (management) An organized group of people or entities who collaborate towards a particular goal
examples: In the literature class, which is conducted by Prof. George J. Smith, lately of Central High School, and which is a collaborative of Dr. Farquhar's course, the students are pursuing their new course.
